topics.body:
It's a bit of video game news that I think you might find interesting; the creator of QWOP recently was interviewed and he ripped to shreds the video game industry.

Traditional logic would state that advertising your products on say Kotaku or such would increase exposure to your games and thus increase sales.  What he tore the video game industry a new one for was that sales wise it doesn't add up.  Basically traditional advertisement on television does work, but there's no hard evidence that advertising on say Kotaku or such actually works and if there is a payoff it's marginal.

Tl:dr; if you want to advertise your game use traditional media cause there's no hard evidence to prove that online advertisment actually pays  off.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

It tastes way more bitter to me than most people. Like after a while of eating chocolate ice cream or something I actually start wincing because it gets so bitter. I had no idea people didn't taste that
